articles.author: Ankita Chakravarti
articles.title: Taking solar eclipse photos can damage your smartphone camera, NASA claims - India Today
articles.description: NASA warns against directly pointing smartphone cameras at the solar eclipse claiming it can cause sensor damage The eclipse visible only in parts of North America and Europe is set to occur on April 8
articles.content: The solar eclipse or surya grahan is all set to take place on April 8. Although it would be visible in some countries, the NASA scientists have a special message for people who like to capture eclips… [+2138 chars]
